org.jetel.graph.analyse

Interface GraphProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraphProvider, SingleGraphProvider

    public interface GraphProvider
    This interface is primarily dedicated for GraphCycleInspector class. In general two implementations exist of this interface. SingleGraphProvider is used for cycle detection in basic transformation graphs. ClusteredGraphProvider is used for cycle detection in clustered graphs. This interface allows to use same cycle detection algorithm for both cases.
    See Also:
    GraphCycleInspector, InspectedComponent

    • Method Detail

      • getNextComponent

        InspectedComponent getNextComponent()
        This method can be invoked repeatedly and handlers for all components are sequentially returned. The InspectedComponent is handler for component, which can be used later for graph layout tracking.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the provider to initial state.

      • getEdgeFunction

        EdgeFunction getEdgeFunction()
        Gets transition function between components in the graph.

      • setEdgeFunction

        void setEdgeFunction(EdgeFunction edgeFunction)
        Sets transition function between components in the graph.

      • setSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent

        void setSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent(boolean subgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent)
        Sets the flag which indicates the SubgraphInput (or SubgraphOutput) component will be considered as single component. Otherwise, each port of SGI or SGO component represents separate 'component' entity for this graph provider. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        subgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent -

      • isSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent

        boolean isSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent()
        Returns:
        the flag which indicates the SubgraphInput (or SubgraphOutput) component will be considered as single component. Otherwise, each port of SGI or SGO component represents separate 'component' entity for this graph provider.

      • setSubgraphInputOutputVisibility

        void setSubgraphInputOutputVisibility(boolean subgraphInputOutputVisibility)
        Sets the flag which indicates whether the SubgraphInput and SubgraphOutput components are part of provided graph. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        subgraphInputOutputVisibility -

      • isSubgraphInputOutputVisibility

        boolean isSubgraphInputOutputVisibility()
        Returns:
        the flag which indicates whether the SubgraphInput and SubgraphOutput components are part of provided graph.
